HediffDef.label: crystalline entity
HediffDef.description:
Crystosentients have no pain receptors. 
Over time new lattice growth will replace missing material, healing damage. Crystosentients maintain terminal size limits by shedding additional growth in a process know as "cleavage" this creates a temporary pawn called a cleaving. 
New lattice won't spawn if a Crystosentient is too hungry and spawns faster when they're in a heated environment (Above 40c). 
Crystosentients spawn cleavlings on death; one for every intact body part.

HediffDef.label: crystalline entity
HediffDef.description: Crystosentients have no pain receptors. \nCleavings are only active a short while before their energy reserves deplete and they become a stationary block of crystal.

HediffDef.label: crystalline entity
HediffDef.description: Crystosentients have no pain receptors. \nFor a short while brooch will radiate heat and spawn cleavings, once their energy is deplated they'll crumble in a large heap of crystal blocks.
